tags.name: CalendarService
tags.description: CalendarService contains methods to create, edit delete calendar meetings

tags.name: ErrorService
tags.description: The Service contains methods to get localized errors

tags.name: FileService
tags.description:
Contains methods to import and upload files into the Files section of the
 conference room and the personal drive of any USER

tags.description:
The Service contains methods to login and create hash to directly enter
 conference rooms, recordings or the application in general

tags.name: InfoService
tags.description: The Service contains methods to get info about the system

tags.name: NetTestService
tags.description: The Service contains methods to trigger a network test

tags.name: RecordingService
tags.description: The Service contains methods to work with recordings

tags.name: RoomService
tags.description: RoomService contains methods to manipulate rooms and create invitation hash

tags.name: UserService
tags.description:
The Service contains methods to login and create hash to directly enter
 conference rooms, recordings or the application in general

tags.name: WbService
tags.description: WbService contains methods to manipulate whiteboard contents
